body.paragraph: In order to start an elaboration click on the menu button and select `Analize`
2. Choose type of tree that you want to generate from the first Tab

3. Choose type of molecule format and write the input in the text area in order to start elaboration.
 If inputs are correct you can click on the bottom right corner button and select
4a. Additionally it can be selected other option like check Watson - Crick Pair
